markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Graceful Leaper](/Feats.aspx?ID=1876) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 155 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=45)

**Prerequisites**
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1873); Master in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

Mass and muscle are meaningless when you leap; only grace and balance matter. You can roll an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check instead of an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check when making a [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37).
name: Graceful Leaper
